original_text: These were the ones chosen from the congregation, the chiefs of their ancestral tribes, the heads of the clans of Israel.
korean_text: 그들은 회중에서 부름을 받은 자요 그 조상 지파의 지휘관으로서 이스라엘 종족들의 우두머리라

sentences.original_text: These were the ones chosen from the congregation
the chiefs of their ancestral tribes
the heads of the clans of Israel
